subject: Mute pin problem = HELP! ASAP!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Well, just took it apart and found the (#5) Mute pin, then tried to pull it out/off with needle-nose plyers, but it's hard to do! Plus, do I just pull harder upwards or with a twist the Mute Pin OR do I incude the black part that's rectangular that, it appears all the other pins are in (does single black part come off or Just the pin)???  I don't want to break it! Yikes, ran into a problem, here!  HELP! ASAP!   8-(   =Judy=   P.S. Am at home on webtv and can't see the videos!
